item.title: Let's encrypt! (Gentoo)
item.author: Author
item.description: Note My domain is provided from Google, the method of getting the API token could be different for other provider Contents Get certificates Apache Config Get certificates emerge -a app-crypt/acme-sh emerge --ask dcron, acme-sh need this to set cron job to renew the certs automatically Get your domain access token from the provider (Google Domain) For Google Domains: export GOOGLEDOMAINS_ACCESS_TOKEN="<generated-access-token>" run acme-sh as root acme.sh --issue --dns dns_googledomains -d bajzc.
